projects.title: Agrim Retailer App
projects.description: Defined software architecture for backend and mobile app, integrated with existing tools, and enabled scaling to 10,000 orders per day.

projects.title: newme Web App
projects.description: Developed frontend and middleware components, implemented business analytics solutions, and designed RESTful APIs.

projects.title: Maasika AI-Powered Symptom Assessment Platform
projects.description: Led the design and development of an AI-driven platform for assessing women's health symptoms, implemented scalable cloud infrastructure, and secured angel funding.

projects.title: MD+ Chronic Care Management System
projects.description: Spearheaded the development of a comprehensive chronic care management system, integrating multiple functionalities to support remote healthcare delivery, designed AI-powered precision treatment protocols, and launched the platform.

projects.title: Tradelab Technologies Crypto Exchange
projects.description: Secured crypto, built a secure & scalable crypto-wallet service, delivered end-to-end crypto-exchange, and strategized PiFinity - an app marketplace platform for stock-brokers.

projects.title: BlackBuck Spot Marketplace
projects.description: Led the Spot Marketplace initiative, enabling true marketplace behavior with 100% supply-side product adoption. Handled end-to-end technology for the Commerce platform.

projects.title: BlackBuck Event Bus
projects.description: Conceptualized the architecture of Event Bus, a platform for inter-service communication, during the migration from a monolithic to a microservices architecture.

projects.title: Tripigator AI-Powered Itinerary Planner
projects.description: Launched the Tripigator app, achieved 100k+ app downloads, facilitated over 1 million travellers, implemented an SEO-integrated Dynamic Content Platform, and launched Tripigator in partnership with Incredible India.

projects.title: Cop Radar (Android App)
projects.description: Developed an Android app from scratch, garnering 100,000 organic downloads.

questions.question: Tell me about your experience with Django REST Framework.
Explain the difference between authentication and authorization.
How do you optimize database queries in Django?
Describe your experience with Celery and message queues.
How would you implement rate limiting for a REST API?
What are the advantages of using Redis in a Django application?
Explain your approach to writing unit and integration tests.
Describe a time you had to debug a performance issue in a Django application.
How familiar are you with AWS services, specifically S3 and Lambda?
